# uptime-kuma Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
terraform {
  required_providers {
    uptime-kuma = {
      source  = "TheodoreHerzfeld/uptime-kuma"
      version = "0.0.8"
    }
  }
}

provider "uptime-kuma" {
  # Configuration options
}
```
